info.title: Sales Document with Credit Block - Read, Check, Release, Reject (A2X)
info.description: The service contains entities for credit blocked sales document and reject reason. Once the sales document has been checked, released, or rejected, a success message containing the document number is sent in the response. Once the credit blocked sales document has been retrieved, the data is sent in the response. If there are any issues when reading, checking, releasing, or rejecting the credit blocked sales document, the system displays error messages in the response.

x-sap-shortText: Read, check, release, and reject credit blocked sales documents using this synchronous inbound service

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Sales: Sales Document (SD_SALESDOC)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.summary: Reads all credit blocked sales documents.
get.description: Reads data of all credit blocked sales documents in the system.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads a specific credit blocked sales document.
get.description: Reads the data of a specific credit blocked sales document, which the consumer specifies by passing the sales document number.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.description: Reads data of all rejection reasons in the system.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: SalesDocumentRjcnReason
parameters.description: Reason for Rejection of Sales Documents

get.description: Reads data of a specific rejection reason, which the consumer specifies by passing the rejection reason ID.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.summary: Checks the credit status of a specific sales document.
post.description: Checks credit status of a sales document. Consumers must pass the sales document number and SD document category.

parameters.name: SDDocumentCategory
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: SalesDocument
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.summary: Rejects a specific credit blocked sales document.
post.description: Rejects the release request of a sales document with a reject reason. Consumers must pass the sales document number, SD document category, and rejection reason.

parameters.name: SDDocumentCategory
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: SalesDocumentRjcnReason
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: SalesDocument
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.summary: Releases a specific sales document from the credit block.
post.description: Releases a sales document by removing the credit block on it. Consumers must pass the sales document number and SD document category.

parameters.name: SalesDocument
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: SDDocumentCategory
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_CreditBlockedSalesDocument HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
